Text:
NOTE: This is in HINDI. There is NO ENGLISH TRACK in this download. If you didn't read the long description above, you might have missed that fact. 

@Harshad - please write the language in the name if it's not in English so people know. If it doesn't fit in the description, shorten the description. You don't need the word "EXCLUSIVE" as much as you need the word "Hindi". Thank you.
